articles.title: Who Should Get the Updated COVID Shot? - VOA Learning English
articles.description: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention says most Americans should get the new COVID-19 shots from Pfizer or Moderna.
articles.content:
American health officials say most people should get the updated COVID-19 vaccine this year.
Last week, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) approved the updated COVID-19 shots … [+3349 chars]
